name: R5-MedicationRequestIntent-R4-MedicationRequestIntent
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationRequestIntent into FHIR R4

element.display: The request represents the view of an authorization instantiated by a fulfilling system representing the details of the fulfiller's intention to act upon a submitted order.

target.display: The request represents the view of an authorization instantiated by a fulfilling system representing the details of the fulfiller's intention to act upon a submitted order.

element.display: The request represents an instance for the particular order and is used to generate a schedule of requests on a medication administration record (MAR).

target.display: The request represents an instance for the particular order, for example a medication administration record.

element.display: The request represents a component or option for a RequestOrchestration that establishes timing, conditionality and/or  other constraints among a set of requests.

target.display: The request represents a component or option for a RequestGroup that establishes timing, conditionality and/or  other constraints among a set of requests.

element.display: The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action

target.display: The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action

element.display: The request represents the original authorization for the medication request.

target.display: The request represents the original authorization for the medication request.

element.display: The request represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act.

target.display: The request represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act.

element.display: The request is a suggestion made by someone/something that doesn't have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act

target.display: The request is a suggestion made by someone/something that doesn't have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act

element.display: The request represents an automatically generated supplemental authorization for action based on a parent authorization together with initial results of the action taken against that parent authorization..

target.display: The request represents an automatically generated supplemental authorization for action based on a parent authorization together with initial results of the action taken against that parent authorization..
